title: KC服务端崩溃
txt_content:
11.11 18:44:30 [Multicraft] Loading server properties
11.11 18:44:30 [Multicraft] Starting server!
11.11 18:44:30 [Multicraft] Loaded config for "MOD: Cauldron (原KC) 1.7.10"
11.11 18:44:30 [Multicraft] Updating eula.txt file
11.11 18:44:30 [Server] INFO We appear to be missing one or more essential library files.
11.11 18:44:30 [Server] INFO You will need to add them to your server before FML and Forge will run successfully.java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch
11.11 18:44:30 [Server] INFO at file:///C:/Users/ADMINI~1.WQ-/AppData/Local/Temp/%25W@GJ$ACOF(TYDYECOKVDYB.pngjava.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
11.11 18:44:30 [Server] INFO at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
11.11 18:44:30 [Server] INFO at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
11.11 18:44:30 [Server] INFO at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
11.11 18:44:30 [Server] INFO at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method)
11.11 18:44:30 [Server] INFO at java.lang.Class.forName(Unknown Source)
11.11 18:44:30 [Server] INFO at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.ServerLaunchWrapper.run(ServerLaunchWrapper.java:25)
11.11 18:44:30 [Server] INFO at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.ServerLaunchWrapper.main(ServerLaunchWrapper.java:12)
11.11 18:44:30 [Server] INFO Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: ignoring option MaxPermSize=128M; support was removed in 8.0
11.11 18:44:30 [Multicraft] Server shut down (starting)
11.11 18:44:30 [Multicraft] Restarting crashed server in 5 seconds
11.11 18:44:30 [Multicraft] Looks like a crash, check the server console. Return value: 1
11.11 18:44:30 [Multicraft] Server stopped
请问各位大神，这是怎么回事，有什么办法解决？

replies.author: 张满月
replies.txt_content:
15628671 发表于 2016-11-13 16:01
我们有自己的主机，早些时候买的
你的记录上是面板无误
如果是自建面板，请用一个完整的服务端放在面板里，不要只放jar

replies.author: KTR
replies.txt_content: 不知道是不是你把library这个文件夹的文件全部删了，重新装一下服务端吧，下次不要乱删东西了

KTR 发表于 2016-11-13 10:15
不知道是不是你把library这个文件夹的文件全部删了，重新装一下服务端吧，下次不要乱删东西了 ...
并不是。。。。

replies.author: 张满月
replies.txt_content: 面板服此问题请联系服务商解决

z89669 发表于 2016-11-13 15:17
面板服此问题请联系服务商解决
